row.item_desc: Upload your top logo via WordPress Media Library and paste the url to that image here. Recommended size is 142px x 77px.
Upload your top logo via WordPress Media Library and paste the url to that image here. Recommended size is 16px x 16px.
HTML is allowed here. Enter your copyright information that will appear in the footer of every page. You do not need to enter the copyright symbol - this is done automatically.
Enter the text you want to appear on all your 'more' buttons. Standard text used generally is "Read More".
Enter the tracking code here that will go in the footer of every page for your analytic reporting.
Enter your custom css here that will over ride the stylesheet.
Enter url of image in the http:// format (recommended size 1200px X 700px. Background image will be disabled on responsive size. Will display on all event pages.
Enter url of image in the http:// format (recommended size 1200px X 700px. Background image will be disabled on responsive size. Will display on search results page.
Enter url of image in the http:// format (recommended size 1200px X 700px. Background image will be disabled on responsive size. Will display on 404 pages.
Enter url of image in the http:// format (recommended size 1200px X 700px. Background image will be disabled on responsive size. Will display on main blog / index page.
Enter some brief text that will appear in your header. Example: Sunday Services 8:30am & 11:00am
Enter the url here that when clicked will take you to a map page on Google or within your site.
Use this area to place a quote or a message you want your reader's to see on your homepage under the slider.
Enter the title for your 1st column heading. Example: Events. **note this will only be used if the Home-Loop page template was chosen as your homepage template.
Place your text here for the link under the homepage 1st column. Example - "See More Events". **note - this will only be shown if you have chosen the Home-Loop as the homepage template.
Place your url here for the link under the homepage 1st column. Can be any internal or external link. **note - this will only be shown if you have chosen the Home-Loop as the homepage template.
Enter the title for your 2nd column heading. Example: Events. **note this will only be used if the Home-Loop page template was chosen as your homepage template.
Choose your category loop for the top row on the home page, 2nd column. You will see the latest 2 posts.
Place your text here for the link under the homepage 2nd column. Example - "See More *category name*". **note - this will only be shown if you have chosen the Home-Loop as the homepage template.
Place your text here for the link under the homepage 2nd column. Can be any internal or external link. **note - this will only be shown if you have chosen the Home-Loop as the homepage template.
Enter the title for your 3rd column heading. Example: Events. **note this will only be used if the Home-Loop page template was chosen as your homepage template.

Choose your category loop for the top row on the home page, 2nd column. You will see the latest post. **note if video format - video will display, if audio format - audio will display, if gallery format - gallery will display and if any other post - featured image will display.
Place your text here for the link under the homepage 3rd column. Example - "See More *category name*". **note - this will only be shown if you have chosen the Home-Loop as the homepage template.
Place your text here for the link under the homepage 3rd column. Can be any internal or external link. **note - this will only be shown if you have chosen the Home-Loop as the homepage template.
This information will be dynamically pulled into your contact page sidebar.
This information will be dynamically pulled into your contact page sidebar.
This information will be dynamically pulled into your contact page sidebar and will open up the user's email program automatically placing your email address in the To: field of the email.
This information will be dynamically pulled into your contact page sidebar. Example: 123 Anywhere Street, Suite 200
This information will be dynamically pulled into your contact page sidebar. Example: Any City, FL 12345
This information will be dynamically pulled into your contact page sidebar. Example: Clerk Office Hours M-F 8:00a to 5:00p
Enter the url to your Facebook page.
Enter the url to your Twitter page.
Enter the url to your Flickr page.
Enter the url to your Vimeo page.
Enter the url to your YouTube Channel page.
Enter the url to your Google Plus account.

Enter your twitter username is this format (twsjonathan) to dynamically draw in 1 tweet on your homepage and if your contact page (and anywhere else you may use the twitter code supplied by the documentation).
